statements.select: INSERT INTO [dbo].[flag_msg] ([CMID] ,[MSG_TYPE] ,[REQUEST_TIME] ,[SEND_TIME] ,[DEST_PHONE] ,[SEND_PHONE] ,[MSG_BODY] ,[USER1] ) VALUES (CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), GETDATE(), 112) + REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(12), GETDATE(), 114), ':', '') + #companyType# + #sysType# ,#msgType# ,GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,#phoneNumber# ,#sendPhoneNumber# ,#msgData# ,#companyType# )
